content: 在另一个世界有另一个你，它的故事因你而改变。智能体世界开启属于你们的文明旅程。新的冒险，从外貌到性格全由你来创造。Nti省时master精细，现在就让你的世界开始运转。智能体诞生后，你的一句话就能定方向、改路径。升级住所，推进职业，改变命运。想知道智能体在想什么？Game mode观察行为与心理。Data mode查看关系、价格和排名，帮他们做出更高收益的决策。每个智能体各自生活，与他们交谈，聆听内心的回响。翻开面板细读状态、行囊、职业与日记。在这片像素大陆，每个智能体的决定源自多层次的AI框架。从个体到世界，数据记录着文明的每一步成长。更多建筑等你和智能体一步步解锁。唤醒城市，迎接未知的冒险与故事。智能体世界不只是游戏，它是你与另一个自己共同创造文明的开始。

key_facts: FACT: In another world, there exists a version of you whose story is shaped by your choices.
FACT: The Agent World allows users to embark on a civilization-building journey together with their alternate self.
FACT: Players can fully customize an agent's appearance and personality from the start.
FACT: After an agent is created, a single user command can alter its direction or life path.
FACT: Players can upgrade housing and advance careers to influence an agent's destiny.
FACT: Game Mode enables observation of agents' behaviors and psychological states.
FACT: Data Mode provides insights into relationships, prices, and rankings to optimize agent decisions.
FACT: Each agent lives independently and makes decisions based on a multi-layered AI framework.
FACT: The pixel-based world records every action and decision made by agents as part of civilizational progress.
FACT: New buildings are progressively unlocked through player and agent collaboration.
key_opinions: OPINION: The ability to shape another version of oneself offers a deeply personal gaming experience.
OPINION: The AI-driven autonomy of agents creates a sense of living, evolving worlds.
OPINION: The dual-mode system (Game Mode and Data Mode) enhances both emotional and strategic engagement.
OPINION: The narrative depth comes not from scripted events but from emergent interactions.
OPINION: This game transcends traditional gameplay by becoming a shared creative platform for civilization building.
key_datapoints: DATA: Agents operate under a multi-layered AI decision-making framework.
DATA: Player actions directly influence agent development and world progression.
DATA: Each agent maintains unique status, inventory, career, and diary entries.
DATA: World growth is tracked through continuous data logging of individual and collective actions.
DATA: New structures unlock incrementally based on player-agent collaboration milestones.
